title: 이달의소녀탐구 #36 (LOONA TV #36)
summary:
2Jin are just goofing off this episode. Lots of silly little moments.
0:02 -- HeeJin: “HyunJin, peekaboo!” as she pretends to poke HyunJin in the
face using the flattened perspective of the camera lense.
0:06 -- HeeJin pats HyunJin’s head then grabs her face. They’re
“very close because they are the same age.”
0:08 -- Sliding past camera.
0:12 -- 2Jin say hi! Then hello! Then hello!
